statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT preference_3, customer_id FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, personalized_recommendation FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value1';
SELECT preference_2, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = '1234';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_3 = 'value3' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, personalized_recommendation FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY preference_1 ASC, preference_3 DESC;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%value%' OR preference_2 ILIKE '%value%' AND preference_3 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT recommendation_id, customer_id FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT recommendation_text, customer_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_text LIKE '%summer%' ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference ->> 'category' = 'food' ORDER BY customer_id ASC

SELECT recommendation_text, customer_id FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND recommendation_id IN (SELECT recommendation_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_text LIKE '%outdoor%')

SELECT recommendation_text, customer_id FROM recommendations r JOIN customer_preferences cp ON r.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.preference ->> 'category' = 'travel' ORDER BY r.recommendation_id
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_category, preference_score FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_score > 50;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_score FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 75;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT preference_score, product_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT recommended_product_id, recommendation_score FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 80 AND recommendation_score < 100;
SELECT customer_id, count(recommendation_id) as total_recommendations FROM personalized_recommendations GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_recommendations DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_category, preference_score FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, order_date FROM e_commerce_orders WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_score > 0.8 ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE product_category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM e_commerce_orders WHERE order_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customers_preferences;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text, date_created FROM personalized_recommendations ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE nonce > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price ASC, category DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT recommendation_text, date_created FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 54321 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM e_commerce_orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
